tool_description: Highly available easy-to-use **Instagram** intelligent **proxy** with the best performance. Get any data from Instagram with **99.99% uptime**. Bigger API plans and **additional functionality** are available on request. Looking forward to hearing you on Telegram: **https://t.me/chilledlobster**. #instagram #ig  #feed #post #story #highlight #igtv #reel #insta #inst #user #profile #search #comment #followers #following #video #photo #image #media #hashtag #scrapper #grabber
title: Instagram best experience

api_list.name: Highlight's Media by highlight_id
api_list.description:
You can GET Highlight's Media by its highlight_id 
e.g. you can get it from a URL: https://instagram.com/stories/highlights/17920266223564403/ where 17920266223564403 is id

api_list.name: Hashtag's Feed by its name
api_list.description: You can GET hashtag's  Feed by its name.

optional_parameters.name: next_max_id
optional_parameters.description:
Is used for pagination by Instagram. 
If you see this parameter in response it means that you could get additional feed data for a particular hashtag by using this parameter in the additional request.

api_list.name: Search Hashtags by Query
api_list.description: You can GET a list of Hashtags by Query (string occurrence).

api_list.name: Comments for Media by media_id
api_list.description: You can GET Comments for Media (Post / IGTV) by its media_id (pk).

api_list.name: Search Users by Query
api_list.description: You can GET a list of Users by Query (string occurrence).

api_list.name: User's User_id by username
api_list.description: You can GET a user's User_id (pk) by their username.

api_list.name: User's Username by user_id
api_list.description: You can GET a user's Username by their user_id (pk).

api_list.name: User's Profile by username
api_list.description: You can GET a user's Profile metadata by their username.

api_list.name: User's Profile by user_id
api_list.description: You can GET a user's Profile metadata by their user_id (pk).

api_list.name: User's Feed by user_id
api_list.description: You can GET user's Feed by their user_id (pk).

optional_parameters.name: next_max_id
optional_parameters.description:
Is used for pagination by Instagram. 
If you see this parameter in response it means that you could get additional feed data for a particular user by using this parameter in the additional request.

api_list.name: User's Stories by user_id
api_list.description: You can GET user's Stories by their user_id (pk).

api_list.name: User's Highlights by user_id
api_list.description: You can GET user's Highlights by their user_id (pk).

api_list.name: User's IGTVs by user_id
api_list.description: You can GET user's IGTVs by their user_id (pk).

api_list.name: User's Followings by user_id
api_list.description: You can GET user's Followings by their user_id (pk).

optional_parameters.name: next_max_id
optional_parameters.description:
Is used for pagination by Instagram. 
If you see this parameter in response it means that you could get additional followings data for a particular user by using this parameter in the additional request.

api_list.name: User's Followers by user_id
api_list.description: You can GET user's Followers by their user_id (pk).

optional_parameters.name: next_max_id
optional_parameters.description:
Is used for pagination by Instagram. 
If you see this parameter in response it means that you could get additional followers data for a particular user by using this parameter in the additional request.

api_list.name: Post / IGTV / Reel by shortcode
api_list.description: You can GET Post, IGTV, or Reel by its shortcode.

api_list.name: Media (Post / Story / IGTV / Reel) by media_id
api_list.description: You can GET any Media (Post, Story (from highlight also), IGTV, or Reel) by its media_id (pk).
